page.title: 16Local News E.K.Library.
page.content: A personal service is given to the four sheltered housing complexes in Greenhills.One experienced assistant is responsible for one lot of sheltered housing.The children's library is called the {Roundabout {Club.}The club has 214 members.The members choose a book then once they have finished their book they return it & the librarian asks questions about the story.Pop requests are the most popular received.Software for home computers is increasingly popular ,quizzes & games mostly.Most people in Greenhill area liked the latest fiction titles.The library tried hard to supply the books & only{1% }were not satisfied.Here are some of the things organised by the library-Hallowe'en party,a fun day,treasure hunt,a book sale & badge making.
